body_html:
Would master...vrv:master make you happy?

(tf.logging.set_verbosity was only ever meant to affect python logging, not C++ logging. This is a legacy google behavior, which has different logging systems for both languages -- hopefully that explains the current situation).
body_text:
Would master...vrv:master make you happy?
(tf.logging.set_verbosity was only ever meant to affect python logging, not C++ logging.  This is a legacy google behavior, which has different logging systems for both languages -- hopefully that explains the current situation).
body:
Would https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/compare/master...vrv:master make you happy?

(tf.logging.set_verbosity was only ever meant to affect python logging, not C++ logging.  This is a legacy google behavior, which has different logging systems for both languages -- hopefully that explains the current situation).
